item.title: Valkyrie House Old-Fashioned Recipe
item.description:
Valkyrie House Old-Fashioned Recipe

This recipe is by Robert Simonson. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.

item.title: Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London
item.description:
Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London

When self-proclaimed tea fanatic and yoga teacher Iona Carter travelled to Kanazawa, Japan last year, something about their brews seemed extra cool. A local specialty, the process of cold brewing tea inspired Carter to launch her own London-based company, TWIG Teas.

item.title: Drinks: Smoked Manhattan
item.description:
Drinks: Smoked Manhattan

Our good friends at Gin & Luck were kind enough to mix up a giant batch of Smoked Manhattan's for the WC-003 trip. When you can't have a fire, the next best thing is a fire in a flask. Here's the recipe for the mixologist in you.
